fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 declined 121.15 points or 0.68% to settle at 17,706.85. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 3.21% to 12.29. Infosys, HDFC Bank and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
